title: GROOM PROFESSIONAL Baby Fresh Dog Shampoo - Soothing Baby Powder Dog Shampoo - Gentle for Sensitive or Itchy Skin - Removes Dandruff & Smelly Puppy Odours, w/Aloe Vera to Help Itching Relief, 1L
features: MILD AND GENTLE FORMULA: The Baby Fresh Shampoo is specially formulated with a mild and gentle formula, making it ideal for puppies and pets with sensitive skin.
SOFT AND FRAGRANT: Enjoy the soft baby powder fragrance that leaves your pet's coat smelling clean and fresh after each bath.
SOOTHING PROPERTIES: Contains Aloe Vera which soothes and heals, as well as acting as a natural conditioner.
MOISTURISES AND CONDITIONS: The gentle formula of the Baby Fresh Shampoo helps moisturise and condition your pet's fur, leaving it soft, shiny, and easy to manage.
PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Groom Professional is a trusted brand among professional groomers, ensuring that you're using a high-quality product for your beloved furry friend.
description: Product Description Groom Professional Baby Fresh Shampoo This popular dog shampoo is a familiar face in many-a-salon thanks to its fresh fragrance and cleaning capabilities. The baby powder scent is a favourite of many and is especially popular when used on pups, somehow making them even cuter! Product Information Gentle but Effective Known for getting rid of puppy odours, this shampoo leaves a long-lasting baby fresh scent that will keep any pup fresh for days. Formulated with Aloe Vera, renowned for its soothing and healing properties, it cleans and deodorises while acting as a natural conditioner. It promotes healthy hair growth, reduces dandruff, and with a 20:1 dilution rate, one bottle provides numerous applications, ensuring your pup stays clean, fresh, and healthy. Directions for Use Pre-wet coat Dilute 20:1 and apply to coat, gently working into a lather Leave in the coat for 5-10 minutes Rinse thoroughly Repeat if necessary Ingredients Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Cocoamidopropyl Betain, Alkyl DimethylAmine Oxide, Polyquaternium 29, Cocamide DEA, Hexylene Glycol, Parfum, CitricAcid, Phenoxy, Butyl Paraben, Ethyl Paraben, Methyl Paraben, Propyl Paraben
